    • Method Detail

      • withTransport

        public abstract T withTransport(Transport transport)
        Sets the network transport.

        The provided Transport will be used to connect to provided Members to join the cluster at startup and participate in all aspects of the Raft consensus protocol.

        Parameters:
        transport - The network protocol.
        Returns:
        The Raft builder.

      • withMembers

        public T withMembers(Member... members)
        Sets the Raft members.

        The provided set of members will be used to connect to the Raft cluster. The members list does not have to represent the complete list of servers in the cluster, but it must have at least one reachable member.

        Parameters:
        members - The Raft members.
        Returns:
        The Raft builder.

      • withMembers

        public T withMembers(Collection<Member> members)
        Sets the Raft members.

        The provided set of members will be used to connect to the Raft cluster. The members list does not have to represent the complete list of servers in the cluster, but it must have at least one reachable member.

        Parameters:
        members - The Raft members.
        Returns:
        The Raft builder.

      • withMembers

        public abstract T withMembers(Members members)
        Sets the Raft members.

        The provided set of members will be used to connect to the Raft cluster. The members list does not have to represent the complete list of servers in the cluster, but it must have at least one reachable member.

        Parameters:
        members - The Raft members.
        Returns:
        The Raft builder.
